title: In order to prevent erosion of soil and silting in lakes, an exclusive green belt of 100 m shall be provided around the periphery of Vihar and PawaiLake, in which no construction whatsoever shall be allowed
clause_text: In order to prevent erosion of soil and silting in lakes, an exclusive green belt of 100 m shall be provided around the periphery of Vihar and PawaiLake, in which no construction whatsoever shall be allowed. If within 100 m from the periphery of Vihar and Pawailake there exists Municipal/Public Road, then buffer of green belt beyond Municipal/Public Road may not be insisted.
section: Periphery of Vihar and Pawai lake:
